### Government Tender Announcement: Data Center Networking Hardware, Software, and Maintenance for DND
#### Notice of Proposed Procurement

Shared Services Canada (SSC) intends to procure Data Center Networking Hardware, Software, and Maintenance and Support for the Department of National Defence (DND) in Gatineau, Quebec. The procurement is seeking quotations for the provision of data center networking solutions, including hardware, software, and maintenance services.

#### Request for Quotations

The Request for Quotations document is attached to this notice and outlines the specific requirements for the bid. Bidders must submit pricing in accordance with Annex A – List of Deliverables and Pricing. The bid must meet all requirements of the bid solicitation to be declared responsive.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract. The evaluation criteria include:

* Mandatory criteria
* Evaluation criteria
* Basis of selection

#### Important Notice to Suppliers

Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, suppliers are required to submit bids electronically using the Contracting Authority’s email. Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted, except in exceptional circumstances.

#### Contract Information

* Contracting entity: Shared Services Canada
* Contact information:
	+ Agnes Kowalska, phone: 343-551-9034, email: None, address: Data Centers and Internal Services, PVR Shared Services Canada 180 Kent St., 13 Floor, PO Box 9808, STS T, Ottawa, Ontario, K1G 4A8
* Notice URL: None
* Attachment:
	+ [Request for Quotations document]
	+ [Attach second document here]

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
